Name: Laser Z
About the game: Fire up your laser, destroy the cubes, duck , weave , and stay alive . Step in to an 80's inspired Vaporwave world and prepare to do battle. Part rhythm game, part strategy, part arcade, totally awesome. Featuring an original Synthwave inspired soundtrack, Laser Z will challenge your reflexes and stamina while requiring you to think strategically. Using the full 360 play space balance speed with energy management to survive. In World Mode, progress through the levels to reach the Boss Level. Beat the Boss to unlock new worlds. Each world brings a new challenge needing new strategies to overcome it. Go for gold and achieve the elusive perfect level. Step in to the Dome in Defender Mode to stay alive as long as you can. Reflexes and stamina required to get your name on the leader board. How long will you last in the Dome? Challenge your friends and family in Party Mode by stepping in to the Alley and facing off against cubes that get faster and faster. How fast can you go? So what are you waiting for? Fire up the lasers, destroy those cubes and see your name in lights.
